content: together we knit by twin stitches designs @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved pattern notes sizes s m l 56 64 72 stitches to fit approx women s small/medium women s large feet or a foot circumference of 8 25 9 21 22 5 cm needles 2 25 mm / us 1 or size needed to obtain correct gauge yarn options 50g of fingering weight yarn sample was knit using fruitful fusion in winter bouquet colorway 75% superwash merino 25% nylon 465 yards per 100 grams gauge unblocked in stockinette 36 stitches x 40 row per 4 / 10 1 cm notions tapestry needle 2 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved cuff using the long tail cast on or preferred row 1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * across cast on co 56 64 72 stitches and join for working in the round making sure row 2 sl1 purl across not to twist the yarn repeat these two row a total of 15 the stitches will be divided between times 30 row needle 1 and needle 2 needle 1 will be the front of your foot while needle 2 heel turn will be the back needle 1 rounds 1-12 follow chart a on page 5 row 1 sl1 k16 18 20 ssk k1 turn 6 7 row 2 sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn needle 2 rounds 1-12 *k2 p2 repeat across row 3 sl1 knit to one stitch before gap ssk k1 turn leg row 4 sl1 purl to one stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn use either the written or charted instructions on page 5 6 7 for needle repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches 1 option a is more of a garter stitch have been worked pattern which the sample was knit with option b is more a ribbed pattern knit across and pick up 15 gusset stitches while picking up an extra stitch for needle 2 knit all stitches on the ladder between the stitches on the row below to close any gaps knit continue working in pattern until the leg across instep stitches in pattern and of your sock is a desired length the then pick up 15 stitches on the other sample was knit to 1 75 / 4 4 cm from gusset side picking up an extra stitch on the ladder between the stitches on the ribbing ending on row 3 the row below to close any gaps heel set up round work round 1 on needle 1 the heel is worked on needle 2 half the stitches 3 @twinstitchesdesigns 2020 all rights reserved gusset toe decrease gusset stitches round 1 k1 ssk knit to the last 3 round 1 stitches k2tog k1 repeat on both needle 1 knit all stitches needles needle 2 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches round 2 knit before the end of row k2tog k1 continue these two rounds until you round 2 have reached 10 12 12 stitches left on knit all stitches each needle graft together using the
